kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = 2019-09-10 04:11:01 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-09-10 04:11:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-09-10 04:11:01 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-09-10 04:11:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-09-10 04:11:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-09-10 04:11:02 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-454890B715D3->9e905a62-78f4-402c-bd42-cdd63641a1f9: receive RaftClientReply:client-454890B715D3->9e905a62-78f4-402c-bd42-cdd63641a1f9@group-1F41FAFA7BE5, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=5, commits[9e905a62-78f4-402c-bd42-cdd63641a1f9:c5] 2019-09-10 04:11:03 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-454890B715D3->9e905a62-78f4-402c-bd42-cdd63641a1f9: receive RaftClientReply:client-454890B715D3->9e905a62-78f4-402c-bd42-cdd63641a1f9@group-1F41FAFA7BE5, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=7, commits[9e905a62-78f4-402c-bd42-cdd63641a1f9:c8]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.msg: ${result} = Found 3 items -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 1020106 2019-09-10 04:10 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/key1 -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 14978 1970-04-08 15:10 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/ozone-15849 drwxrwxrwx - ...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
